page.title: 16HOME LIFE (Continued)
page.content: {A day in the live of Amy Ferguson and {Katherine Foster aged 8 yrs. After hymn practise we have lunch and play for 1 hour.When we go into school if you have finished your work you can play with the games (sometimes).then at 2.20.pm we go out to play.when we get in we clear up and have a story which at the moment is "No more school" by William Mayne.School ends at 3.15.pm. but we go to music club till 4.00.pm.When we get home we play outside on a monkey swing,a see-saw or a normal swing.After tea we play games and then we have a bath then go to bed.At about 8.00.pm.
